summary.para: Retrieves the ProgID associated with an object.

param.name: ppszProgID
param.para: A pointer to a string that, when this method returns successfully, contains the ProgID.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the ProgID of an object.

param.name: pszProgID
param.para: A pointer to a string that contains the new ProgID.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that provide access to the ProgID associated with an object.
